Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the Syracuse regional airport authority
Summary: Relates to the powers of the Syracuse regional airport authority; provides that the Syracuse regional airport authority shall determine which positions, with the exception of all police positions, shall be in the exempt class of civil service.
LawCode: Amd ยง2799-ggg, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the powers of the Syracuse regional airport authority
